sources.title: Safe Corridor (Shindisi) | Full Movie | Powerful War Drama | English Subtitles
sources.description:
Safe Corridor (Shindisi) - Based on real events that occurred during the Russian military intervention in Georgia in 2008. Shindisi is a name of the location where Russian occupation forces sieged Georgian military after a peace corridor was promised.
2019.  Stars: Goga Pipinashvili, Dato Bakhtadze, Tamar Abshilava
*Licensed from Alliance Entertainment. All rights reserved*

metadata.Plot: A story of the film is based on real events that occurred during the Russian military intervention in Georgia in 2008. Shindisi is a name of the place where Russian occupation forces sieged Georgian military after peace corridor was promised, this is when ordinary villagers took risks to save wounded Georgian soldiers.
metadata.Actors: Goga Pipinashvili, Dato Bakhtadze, Tamar Abshilava
